net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.dialog

Interface Dialog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractDialog, AttributeReadId<String>, AttributeReadTitle<String>, AttributeReadVisible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMainDialogController, AbstractNavigationDialogController, AbstractPageDialogController, DialogController, RootDialogController

    public interface Dialog
extends AbstractDialog
    This is the interface for a dialog of the client application. It displays itself in the page of the main application window. It is a singleton instance that is addressed via a DialogPlace. A Dialog should NOT be mixed with a PopupDialog.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.dialog.AbstractDialog

        PATTERN_DIALOG_ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getType()
      This method determines the type of this Dialog.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.dialog.AbstractDialog

        getId, getTitle, isVisible

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        String getType()
        This method determines the type of this Dialog. There are predefined TYPE_* constants for common types in DialogConstants. However, you can simply create additional custom types for your needs.
        Returns:
        the type of this Dialog.
        See Also:
        DialogConstants.TYPE_MAIN, DialogConstants.TYPE_HEADER, DialogConstants.TYPE_FOOTER, DialogConstants.TYPE_NAVIGATION, DialogConstants.TYPE_SIDE, DialogConstants.TYPE_ROOT
